features: &#12304 Premium Quality &#12305 The suction cup hooks are made of high-quality polycarbonate with a durable PVC pad. The Premium PVC material makes the suction cup hook more eco-friendly, sturdy, durable, waterproof, long-term use, as well as a transparent looking.

&#12304 Heavy-Duty Suction Cup &#12305 Suction hooks hold up to 22 LB, suction cups with key lock technology make it ultra-strong. Heavy-duty PVC material and lever lock ensure that the suction cup hook can firmly be attached to the glass or smooth walls. Ensure the suction cup hooks longer working, you could wash the cup with water before use.

&#12304 Easy to Install &#12305 Simply choose a clean, dry smooth surface, stick suction cups and press firmly on the top to squeeze the air, then pull down the suction hooks to lock it. No tool needed!

&#12304 Removable and Reusable &#12305 No tool needed to remove! Just lift the hook to pull out the suction cup, will not leave any marks on the wall. If you want to change a place to use it, You can remove and clean the suction cup, then you can use it again after drying.

&#12304 Wide Usability &#12305 The suction hooks can be used for home, bathroom, Kitchen, livingroom, glass window, office, or other non-porous surfaces, it will works great for holding shower towel, utensils, washcloth, bag, key, Christmas wreath decorations.
